Name: John Bosco
description:
John Bosco is a resident of Kijonjjo, Kyotera district who is aged 48 years and married with four children.

He is a farmer at the same location dealing in banana production.

He earns less from sales and, after research, this is due to poor quality bananas. John Bosco is seeking a loan to buy fertilizers and manure so he can better his soils.

He will equally mulch to regain water in soil so crops can grow on fertile land and sprout into good quality bananas for resale at profitable prices.
